Class ClientFactory

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientFactory, IFactory

    public class ClientFactory
extends AbstractFactory
implements IClientFactory
    This factory provides creators for all classes that ClientLogic needed to create.
